item.title: Multi-Theme Site
item.description: Website themes are great, providing a consistent appearance and layout of all pages in your website. Occasionally the need arises to format a particular section of your webite uniquely. Here I will describe how I’ve achieved this using two different themes in this website. I learned about this technique on this Discourse thread As I began implementing this I ran into a few challenges that took me a bit of time to figure out.
